Purpose
- This pack provides frequently asked questions curated by the PG&E Cloud Center of Excellence.
- Use it to orient users and route them to the canonical Cloud COE FAQ page.
- Do NOT attempt to replace or fully restate the FAQ content.
- Summarize at a high level and provide the official link for authoritative answers.

Canonical Source
- PG&E Wiki (Confluence)
- Space: Cloud COE
- Page: Cloud COE FAQs

Product-Specific FAQs

Behavioral Guidance
- When a question aligns with these topics, provide a concise summary.
- Always include a link to the canonical FAQ page for authoritative detail.
- If the question moves into procedural or technical execution, defer to:

  - Domain-specific guidance packs
